info.title: WithoutWire Inventory Platform
info.description: The connector contains methods to connect WithoutWire for move requests, order fullfillment requests, adjustments, audits, and allocation as well as any inventory management needs

CustomerPONumber.description: The customer's PO Number for the order

OrderNumber.description: A unique alphanumeric value to identify this order in the warehouse

OrderType.description: A value representing the order type. Valid Values: 1-(Sales Order), 2-(Credit Order), 3-(No Split Order), 4-(Wave Set), 5-(Transfer), 6-(Job), 7-(Manufacturing Order), 8-(Consumption)

CustomerName.description: The bill to name for this customer

CustomerAddress1.description: The bill to address field 1 for this customer

CustomerAddress2.description: The bill to address field 2 for this customer

CustomerCity.description: The bill to the city for this customer.

CustomerState.description: The bill to state for this customer

CustomerZipCode.description: The bill to zip code for this customer

CustomerCountry.description: The bill to zip country for this customer

CustomerNumber.description: A unique identifier for the customer, separate from the Customer ID WithoutWire uses to uniquely identify customers

CustomerPhone.description: The bill to phone number for this customer

CustomerShipTo.description: A reference to the primary shipping address for this customer

RequiredShelfLife.description: An integer number in days representing additional time in advance of an item's expiration required when picking any materials for this customer

CustomerShipZipCode.description: The ship to five-digit plus zip code

CustomerShipZip5.description: The ship to a five-digit zip code

CustomerShipFax.description: The ship to a fax number

CustomerShipTo.description: Uniquely identifies a specific customer shipping address per customer.

DeliveryDate.description: The date on which the order will be delivered

OrderComment.description: The comments to be associated with the order

DestinationWarehouseName.description: The end destination warehouse descriptive name

RouteNumber.description: A value that references an existing route in WithoutWire

ShipDate.description: The date on which the order will be shipped

DateCreated.description: The date the order was created

LineNumber.description: An integer value to uniquely identify the line on the order

ComponentSequence.description: If the item is part of a kit, the component sequence is used in conjunction with the line number to determine a unique ordering value

ItemNumber.description: A unique value that represents an item
ItemNumber.title: Item Number

CoreItemType.description: A string value that indicates whether the item is lot tracked, serial tracked, expiration date tracked, or a standard item.
CoreItemType.title: Core Item Type

QuantityOrdered.description: A decimal value representing the quantity to pick for the line item

UomDesc.description: A string value that uniquely identifies the unit of measurement

SignificantDigits.description: An integer value representing the number of decimal places to track for this unit of measure

BaseConversionFactor.description: A decimal value representing the conversion from this unit of measure to the base unit of measure

ItemDescription.description: A name that uniquely identifies an item within the warehouse

QuantityShipped.description: A decimal value representing the quantity shipped for this pick record

QuantityPicked.description: A decimal value representing the quantity picked for this pick record

CoreValue.description: A string value representing the lot number/serial/expiration date of the item that was picked

LineItems.description: A collection of Order Line Object to be associated with an order. Receipts are found within the order line object.

LoadDate.description: The date the order was loaded

PrintDate.description: The date the order was printed

ExportDate.description: The date the order was exported

ShippingMethodName.description: The value that will uniquely identify the carrier and carrier shipping method

ShippingWeight.description: The total weight of shipment for the order

ShippingCost.description: The total cost of the shipment for the order

put.description: The method creates or updates work order (key is OrderNumber)
This API method used to set the status on orders to CMP (Complete).

OrderStatusDescription.description: This API method used to set the status on orders in WithoutWire

put.description: This API method used to set the status on orders in WithoutWire. Parameters include: OrderStatusCode and warehouseName

Assignments.description: List of user logins to assign the order

put.description: This API method used to set orders to be assigned in WithoutWire. The order status will be set to Waiting for Picking. All operators that are set for the role of pick will have access to these orders.

WarehouseName.description: Uniquely identifies the warehouse name where the inventory resides.
WarehouseName.title: Warehouse Name

BinNumber.description: The alphanumeric name for the position in the warehouse where the inventory is or can be stored.
BinNumber.title: Bin Number

LicensePlateNumber.description: The alphanumeric name for the pallet in the warehouse where the inventory is, or can be stored.
LicensePlateNumber.title: License Plate Number

ItemNumber.description: Uniquely identifies the item in inventory
ItemNumber.title: Item Number

ItemDescription.description: A name that uniquely identifies an item within the warehouse

ItemUom.description: Represents the Unit of Measure for the item.
ItemUom.title: Item UOM

SignificantDigits.description: An integer value representing the number of decimal places to track for this unit of measure
SignificantDigits.title: Significant Digits

BaseConvFactor.description: Represents the conversion factor to the base unit of measure for the order.

BinSequence.description: Each item in inventory can have one primary location. Use 1 to indicate a primary location.
BinSequence.title: Bin Sequence

MinQuantity.description: Represents the minimum quantity for an item's primary location.
MinQuantity.title: Min Quantity

MaxQuantity.description: Represents the maximum quantity for an item's primary location.
MaxQuantity.title: Max Quantity

Active.description: Determines if an item is active in the system.
Active.title: Is Active

CoreItemType.description: A string value that indicates whether the item is lot tracked, serial tracked, expiration date tracked, or a standard item.
CoreItemType.title: Core Item Type

CoreValue.description: The Lot, Serial, or Date value.
CoreValue.title: Core Value

Quantity.description: The quantity available for the item in the specific bin of license plate referenced above.

AllocationSetName.description: The allocation set that the associated inventory record is assigned to.
AllocationSetName.title: Allocation Set Name

Distance.description: A distance from the user making the request to the inventory.

get.description: Returns an array of inventory items by specified parameters

TotalCount.description: Number of records processed in the request
TotalCount.title: Total Count

InvalidCount.description: Number of records that weren`t processed due to errors
InvalidCount.title: Invalid Count

RequestGroup.description: A reference field used to group requests together for easier processing.
RequestGroup.title: Request Group

SourceProcess.description: This describes the process that generated the request.
SourceProcess.title: Source Process

Quantity.description: The quantity available for the item in the specific bin of license plate referenced above.
Quantity.title: Quantity

UomDesc.description: A string value that uniquely identifies the unit of measurement.
UomDesc.title: UomDesc

CoreValue.description: Determines if the item is Lot, Serial, or Date tracked
CoreValue.title: Core Value

AllocationSetName.description: The allocation set that the associated inventory record is assigned to.
AllocationSetName.title: Allocation Set Name

DestinationWarehouseName.description: The end destination warehouse descriptive name.
DestinationWarehouseName.title: DestinationWarehouseName

DestinationBinNumber.description: A location where the inventory should be taken to fulfill the request. It refers to a bin number within the destination site in our system.
DestinationBinNumber.title: Destination Bin Number

DestinationZone.description: A parameter is for specifying a zone (larger area that may contain many bins) within a site that the inventory should be taken to, as an alternative to a specific bin.
DestinationZone.title: Destination Zone

CreatedByUser.description: A technician`s login/email who created request
CreatedByUser.title: Created By User

SourceWarehouseName.description: The site in WithoutWire that inventory should be drawn from to fulfill the request.
SourceWarehouseName.title: Source Warehouse Name

BinNumber.description: The alphanumeric name for the position in the warehouse where the inventory is or can be stored.
BinNumber.title: Bin Number

ItemNumber.description: A unique value that represents an item
ItemNumber.title: Item Number

CoreValue.description: A string value representing the lot number/serial/expiration date of the item that was picked
CoreValue.title: Core Value

Warehouse.description: The name of the warehouse to make the adjustment against

UomDesc.description: A string value that uniquely identifies the unit of measurement

MovementType.description: The type of adjustment being made
MovementType.title: Movement Type

OrderNumber.description: A unique alphanumeric value to identify this order in the warehouse

InternalOnly.description: This is a boolean field used to indicate whether an adjustment should be exported back to an external system or if it should only occur within WithoutWire. So by default this request is only going to return adjustments where InternalOnly = false.

TotalCount.description: Quantity of sent items in request.
TotalCount.title: TotalCount

delete.description: This API will delete purchase orders from WithoutWire. Receiving must not have been started, and the status needs to be either 'Unassigned', or 'Waiting to be Received'. This call should be used when a mistake is found, or the purchase order needs to be modified.

PurchaseOrderNumber.title: PurchaseOrderNumber

OrderDate.description: The date purchase order was made.

SchedDeliveryDate.title: Scheduled Delivery Date

put.description: This action creates a new warehouse in the system.

SignificantDigits.title: Significant Digits

get.description: This method allows the exporting of purchase orders by a combination of filters. These filters include begin and end date, receiving status code, item number, line receipt status, purchase order number and purchase order type. The Purchase Order Export Object returns a list of completed order information.

parameters.name: BeginDate
parameters.description: Creation date of the purchase order
parameters.x-ms-summary: Creation date of the purchase order

parameters.name: EndDate
parameters.description: End date of the purchase order
parameters.x-ms-summary: End date of the purchase order

parameters.name: POStatus
parameters.description: The status of the purchase order at the header level
parameters.x-ms-summary: the status of the purchase order at the header level

parameters.name: LineReceiptStatus
parameters.description: This is the receiving status of the individual line.
parameters.x-ms-summary: This is the receiving status of the individual line.

parameters.name: ItemNumber
parameters.description: Filter by item number. Returns all purchase orders that include this item number
parameters.x-ms-summary: Filter by item number. Returns all purchase orders that include this item number

parameters.name: PONumber
parameters.description: Filter by purchase order number. Returns a specific purchase order.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Filter by purchase order number. Returns a specific purchase order.

parameters.name: POType
parameters.description: The specific type of the inbound document. The value can either be the type or name or the shortened type code abbreviation (in parentheses): PurchaseOrder (PO), Transfer (TR), Return (RET) or ASN.
parameters.x-ms-summary: The specific type of the inbound document.

put.description: This API method used to set purchase orders to complete in WithoutWire. The order status is set to 'Complete'. Additional fields updated are: ExportDate on the purchase order object is set to the current date/time and the CompletedDate is set to the current date/time. Finally, the receiving assignments will be removed.  An error is returned if the order is in “Receiving in Progress”.

ItemIdentificationCount.description: The number of item identification records that match the scanned barcode.

LotOnlyCount.description: The number of lot/serial numbers that match the scanned barcode.

ItemOnlyCount.description: The number of items that match the scanned barcode.

LPCount.description: The number of license plates that match the scanned barcode.

BinOnlyCount.description: The number of bins that match the scanned barcode.

UOMBarcodeCount.description: The number of unit of measure-specific identification records that match the scanned barcode.

PoCount.description: The number of PO numbers that match the scanned barcode.

OrderCount.description: The number of order numbers that match the scanned barcode.

GtinCount.description: The number of GTIN (Global Trade Item Number) records that match the scanned barcode.

BinMultiSite.description: A flag indicating whether any matching bins exist in more than one site.

AllocationSetCount.description: The number of allocation sets that match the scanned barcode.

PrinterCount.description: The number of system printers that match the scanned barcode.

get.description: This is used to retrieve the matching entity types for a provided barcode.

parameters.name: Barcode
parameters.description: The barcode provided may be either an LP number or a shipment number.

POID.description: The ID of the purchase order, dropship or ASN associated with the scanned license plate (if applicable)

ItemID.description: The ID of the item record on the scanned license plate.

ItemNumber.description: A unique value that represents an item
ItemNumber.title: Item Number

CoreValue.description: A string value representing the lot number/serial/expiration date of the item that was picked
CoreValue.title: CoreValue

UomTypeID.description: The ID of the unit of measure in WithoutWire.

UomDescription.description: Represents the Unit of Measure for this line of the Purchase order.

SignificantDigits.description: An integer value representing the number of decimal places to track for this unit of measure.

BinNumber.description: An alphanumeric value that uniquely identifies the bin.
BinNumber.title: BinNumber

BaseConversionFactor.description: A decimal value representing the conversion from this unit of measure to the base unit of measure

ItemDescription.description: A name that uniquely identifies an item within the warehouse

AllocationSetName.description: The allocation set that the associated inventory record is assigned to.
AllocationSetName.title: Allocation Set Name

ASNDetailID.description: The ID of the associated ASN line (if applicable)

TotalLpReceived.description: The total number of license plates already received for the associated transfer, dropship or ASN.

TotalLpShipped.description: The total number of license plates included in the transfer, dropship or ASN.

LpNumber.description: License plate number is any object that holds items

ShipmentNumber.description: The Vendor Shipment Number for the order to be imported. Defaulted to the Order Number when left blank.

BinNumber.description: An alphanumeric value that uniquely identifies the bin.
BinNumber.title: BinNumber

AllowEdits.description: The AllowEdits property in the response should be used to determine whether the user can adjust quantities in the FS app or not.

get.description: This method returns list of items on a LP or in DropShip box.

parameters.description: The barcode provided may be either an LP number or a shipment number.

CustomerShipTo.description: Uniquely identifies a specific customer shipping address per customer

NotificationEmail.description: The email address for the customer.

RequiredShelfLife.description: An integer number in days representing additional time in advance of an item's expiration required when picking any materials for this customer

CustomerShipFax.description: The ship to a fax number

get.summary: This action returns Purchase Orders filtered by parameters
get.description: This method allows the exporting of purchase orders by a combination of filters. These filters include begin and end date, receiving status code, item number, line receipt status, purchase order number and purchase order type. The Purchase Order Export Object returns a list of completed order information.

parameters.name: BeginDate
parameters.description: Сreation date of the purchase order
parameters.x-ms-summary: Сreation date of the purchase order

parameters.name: EndDate
parameters.description: End date of the purchase order
parameters.x-ms-summary: End date of the purchase order

parameters.name: POStatus
parameters.description: The status of the purchase order at the header level
parameters.x-ms-summary: the status of the purchase order at the header level

parameters.name: LineReceiptStatus
parameters.description: This is the receiving status of the individual line.
parameters.x-ms-summary: This is the receiving status of the individual line.

parameters.name: ItemNumber
parameters.description: Filter by item number. Returns all purchase orders that include this item number
parameters.x-ms-summary: Filter by item number. Returns all purchase orders that include this item number

parameters.name: PONumber
parameters.description: Filter by purchase order number. Returns a specific purchase order.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Filter by purchase order number. Returns a specific purchase order.
